string-array.name: item_descriptions
string-array.item: A megalodon battles with a crocosaurus causing massive destruction. The US Army has to try and destroy the havoc creating monsters.
Fin has to go back in time to rejoin his shark-battling friends to stop the first Sharknado and save humanity.

After losing his parents, a priest travels to China, where he inherits a mysterious ability that allows him to turn into a dinosaur. At first horrified by this new power, a hooker convinces him to use it to fight crime. And ninjas.
